item.title: Mocha test-runner with gulp
item.description: 这篇文章（56643084ce2cd4cc6659b45c）是从 Teambition 迁移过来的 Passing shared module in all tests // npm install gulp gulp-mocha var gulp = require('gulp'); var mocha = require('gulp-mocha'); gulp.task('default', function() { return gulp.src(['test/test-*.js'], { read: false }) .pipe(mocha({ reporter: 'spec', globals: { should: require('should') } })); }); Running mocha tests when files change // npm install gulp gulp-mocha gulp-util var gulp = require('gulp'); var mocha = require('gulp-mocha'); var gutil = require('gulp-util'); gulp.
